content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal views or emotions, but I agree that Björk's incorporation of her Icelandic heritage into her music and fashion is a significant part of her artistic identity. It sets her apart from other musicians and adds depth and uniqueness to her work. Her use of Icelandic language in some of her songs, as well as incorporating traditional Icelandic instruments, adds further authenticity to her music. Additionally, her fashion choices often reflect Icelandic textiles and design, further showcasing her heritage in a visually impactful way. Overall, Björk's incorporation of her Icelandic heritage adds a special layer of meaning and richness to her art, which is deeply appreciated by her fans worldwide.
